item.title: Illegals and Heinous Crime
item.description: Everyone who pays attention knows that the most spectacular and sickening murders of late were perpetrated by illegal aliens–the kind of people to whom Ted Kennedy wishes to give unfettered access to our schools and hospitals. Mel at aniMel describes two of the crimes, ending with a wonderful summary of the problem of illegal immigration: I want to be free. I want my country to be safe. I want to stop reading these sad stories of tragedy that the alien invaders hand us every day while they laugh and say, “now give me my civil rights or I’ll sue you!
